PACKAG 
 IDENT main
SCOLON 
  FUNC 
 IDENT main
LPAREN 
RPAREN 
LPAREN 
RPAREN 
LBRACE 
   VAR 
 IDENT i
   I32 i32
  ASGN =
INTLIT 777
SCOLON 
   VAR 
 IDENT pi
 MULOP *
   I32 i32
  ASGN =
 REFOP &
 IDENT i
SCOLON 
 IDENT printf
LPAREN 
STRLIT this should print address of i (&i) but prints 777 : pi == %d

 COMMA 
 IDENT pi
RPAREN 
SCOLON 
 MULOP *
 IDENT pi
  ASGN =
INTLIT 888
SCOLON 
 IDENT printf
LPAREN 
STRLIT this should print 888 but prints 777 : i == %d

 IDENT i
RPAREN 
SCOLON
